episode_event_general_chocolat_2022/6701: So this Palentine’s Day on Pasio...

It’s an event for showing thanks to others
by giving them sweets, I hear.

It sounds like some people also give presents to a
person they fancy, too.

I hear if you walk around town this time
of year, you can see a lot of couples givin’
each other gifts.

The only problem is, it’s difficult to focus on my
training when the smell of baked goods is in
the air.

Come to think of it, didn’t Dawn and Serena
mention that they’ve made something for
Palentine’s Day before?

I wanna learn from them how to make some
homemade chocolates!

Wanna come with me? We can make
them together!

Chocolates? Oh, I couldn’t...
I-I’ve got training to do...

Ack! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Were you listening to us just now?

This is a secret, OK?! Especially from my big bro
and Gloria!

If you keep it a secret, maybe I’ll make some for
you, too!
episode_event_general_chocolat_2022/6801:
All over town, that sweet,
sweet aroma...

My heart is full just from being surrounded by the
scent of baked goods...

I hope my presents make everyone just as happy
as you look right now!
